scenes.description: Lui and Watame performing 'Magan Wink' on stage.
Lui and Watame performing 'Himitsu no Oshigoto' on stage.

subtitles.original: My Eye Eye...
subtitles.english: My Eye Eye...

subtitles.original: 目にもの見せる My Eye Eye
subtitles.english: I'll show you what I'm made of, My Eye Eye.

subtitles.original: Wink off
subtitles.english: Wink off.

subtitles.original: 目をつぶる半分で
subtitles.english: With eyes half closed,

subtitles.original: Make a Wink
subtitles.english: Make a Wink.

subtitles.original: 有能が喧嘩上等
subtitles.english: My talent is ready for a fight.

subtitles.original: My god My god
subtitles.english: My god, My god.

subtitles.original: 禍々
subtitles.english: So ominous.

subtitles.original: ほらご覧 瞬く間に
subtitles.english: Look now, in the blink of an eye,

subtitles.original: My Eye Eye Eye'll kill you
subtitles.english: My Eye Eye, I'll kill you.

subtitles.original: Wink
subtitles.english: Wink.

subtitles.original: 後ろ指 指したいならお好きにどうぞ
subtitles.english: If you want to point fingers behind my back, go ahead.

subtitles.original: 当方 当然 振り返らぬ所存で降臨在
subtitles.english: I descend here with absolutely no intention of looking back.

subtitles.original: お待たせ Suck out Suck out
subtitles.english: Kept you waiting, Suck out, Suck out.

subtitles.original: おさらば 恨み Cut Cut
subtitles.english: Farewell, malice, Cut, Cut.

subtitles.original: 無礼講な断頭台で
subtitles.english: At this free-for-all guillotine,

subtitles.original: I'm coming back coming back coming back
subtitles.english: I'm coming back, coming back, coming back.

subtitles.original: 目じゃない眼中にはない
subtitles.english: You're nothing to me, not even in my sights.

subtitles.original: 善良じゃないだろう
subtitles.english: It's not virtuous, right?

subtitles.original: 最良じゃないだろう
subtitles.english: It's not the best, right?

subtitles.original: それがどうしたんだ Franticだね
subtitles.english: So what? You're frantic.

subtitles.original: 目には眼を
subtitles.english: An eye for an eye,

subtitles.original: 歯には羽を
subtitles.english: A wing for a tooth.

subtitles.original: La La La La La
subtitles.english: La La La La La...

subtitles.original: C'est la la vie
subtitles.english: C'est la la vie.

subtitles.original: あぁ類は友を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Ah, birds of a feather flock together.

subtitles.original: C'est la vie 羽ばたきを知るWink
subtitles.english: C'est la vie, a wink that knows how to fly.

subtitles.original: 目が離せない
subtitles.english: You can't look away,

subtitles.original: 完璧なWink
subtitles.english: From this perfect wink.

subtitles.original: 赤裸々 Lovin' セキララ Gimme a Wink
subtitles.english: Naked Lovin', nakedly Gimme a Wink.

subtitles.original: Say La La Liar 真っ赤っ赤だ
subtitles.english: Say La La Liar, you're bright red.

subtitles.original: Oh Eye Eye I want you de
subtitles.english: Oh Eye Eye, I want you de...

subtitles.original: バイバイあそばせ
subtitles.english: ...bid you bye-bye.

subtitles.original: 目にもの見せる My Eye Eye
subtitles.english: I'll show you what I'm made of, My Eye Eye.

subtitles.original: もう目が離せない Eye Eye
subtitles.english: You can't take your eyes off me anymore, Eye Eye.

subtitles.original: 魔眼ウインク
subtitles.english: Demon Eye Wink.

subtitles.original: I kill you
subtitles.english: I kill you.

subtitles.original: 引けない
subtitles.english: I can't back down,

subtitles.original: なんてありえない
subtitles.english: That's impossible,

subtitles.original: 後に引けない
subtitles.english: There's no retreat,

subtitles.original: むやみにひけらかさない Fly
subtitles.english: Don't show it off unnecessarily, Fly.

subtitles.original: いつも突然のハラハラ
subtitles.english: Always sudden suspense,

subtitles.original: 火花散らせば命からがら
subtitles.english: Sparks fly, barely escaping with our lives.

subtitles.original: 待ったなし 個別ダンシング
subtitles.english: No waiting allowed, individual dancing,

subtitles.original: 知らぬが仏 ステップでかわしちゃうぜ
subtitles.english: Ignorance is bliss, I'll dodge it with a step.

subtitles.original: サラリーな社会が眠る頃に
subtitles.english: When the salaried society is asleep,

subtitles.original: パラリラ輩バックするコロニー
subtitles.english: Noisy hooligans back up the colony.

subtitles.original: 不実もっと烈 表裏一体を
subtitles.english: Insincerity grows intense, slipping through the two sides,

subtitles.original: くぐり抜けて Let's go
subtitles.english: Of the same coin, Let's go.

subtitles.original: 平日は Shoo be doo be do
subtitles.english: Weekdays are Shoo be doo be do,

subtitles.original: 週末も Shoo be doo be do
subtitles.english: Weekends are also Shoo be doo be do.

subtitles.original: 時にきつくハードに
subtitles.english: Sometimes tight and hard,

subtitles.original: 時に平和なバードに
subtitles.english: Sometimes like a peaceful bird.

subtitles.original: 今宵 ひみつのおしごと
subtitles.english: Tonight, it's secret work.

subtitles.original: 綺羅煌々 狙って Bang ba bang
subtitles.english: Glittering brightly, aiming Bang ba bang,

subtitles.original: 外さない クリア
subtitles.english: I won't miss, Clear.

subtitles.original: いざ堂々 目立って Run and gun
subtitles.english: Now majestic, standing out, Run and gun,

subtitles.original: 未だに他に類を見ない
subtitles.english: Still unparalleled by any other.

subtitles.original: 意気揚々 迫って Bang ba bang
subtitles.english: In high spirits, approaching Bang ba bang,

subtitles.original: 悟られず カバー
subtitles.english: Unnoticed, Cover.

subtitles.original: Here we go yo 気取ってさあ出番
subtitles.english: Here we go yo, putting on airs, it's showtime.

subtitles.original: 跡を濁さず Take off
subtitles.english: Leaving no trace behind, Take off.

subtitles.original: 決して逃がさない
subtitles.english: I'll never let you escape,

subtitles.original: 剥いた牙を抜くまで
subtitles.english: Until I pull out your bared fangs.

subtitles.original: 決して穢さない
subtitles.english: I'll never let it be defiled,

subtitles.original: 守る無二の看板
subtitles.english: The unique reputation I protect.

subtitles.english: Endless preparation, Oh yeah.

subtitles.english: Serving you up a regretful aftermath, Oh yeah.
